title: Projects,chalices, 1925
medium: Pencil, dark purple watercolor, white heightening, creamy paper
description: Vertical rectangle. Bordering line as 1939-84-20. Round foot and shaft. At the base: GLORY OF GOD AND IN LOVING MEMORY OF; knob with gems and vine rinceaux. Bottom left: The photo shoes corrected design. / instead of ornament and jewels / quotation from Scripture could / be chased on knop; bottom right: A over; verso: bottom left, between moldings, refers to sections of shaft: 1-1/2" / 2=3/4"

tombstone.epitaph: Projects,chalices, 1925.Pencil, dark purple watercolor, white heightening, creamy paper. 1939-84-84-b.
